Author: eren0x
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO SALE] BITLUMENS - Solar Energy+IoT in Latin America
Body: Our mission is to offer a peer to peer platform where users adopt PV systems to reduce carbon emissions and get access to lighting and water in places where there is no power grid or proper access to water. Our platform allows the payment of the hardware in installments and using Bitlumens tokens (BLS). The system also allows microfinance and remittances in digital and fiat currencies while using the blockchain. Our goal is to create both financial return and positive measurable social and environmental impact. We gather Know your Customer (KYC) data for each client while giving access to electricity and water coming from renewable generating sources in Latin America. Providing solar energy to remote villages and in consequence reducing CO2 and health hazards, displacing kerosene lamps, diesel generators, plastic, biomass and biofuels as lighting source, increasing customer savings, proliferating financial inclusion and in some cases providing employment.

Author: Bitlumens.com
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO SALE] BITLUMENS - Solar Energy+IoT in Latin America
Body: Bitlumens brings Solar Power and Water to Undeveloped Communities in Latin America using the Blockchain and Internet of Things (IoT) BLS is backed by actual solar program up and running in Latin America.  Website: https://www.bitlumens.com Whitepaper: Telegram: https://t.me/BitlumensNews Bounty: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=3203300.0  Whitepaper Video: https://youtu.be/W7z-AC5l4BU Guatemala Pilot program video: https://youtu.be/zY6FK_4HA3A Forbes' Coverage on Bitlumen's Roadshow in Davos:One Thing Is Clear From Davos, Blockchain Is Out Of Beta  BitLumen's Pre-ICO starts on May 29th, 2018! Join the Whitelist now for 40% bonus! PM for Private Sale info BOUNTY PROGRAM Coming soon.    WHAT IS BITLUMENS Bitlumens is a clean energy company based in Switzerland. We distribute pay-as-you-go solar kit to undeveloped off-grid areas in Latin America, enable them access to electricity and clean water. The solar kit can be only enabled via BLS tokens, which the villagers buy from our local agents using fiat money (covers the cost of the machine). The local agents make sure the utility records are saved onto IPFS and get a commission in BLS. By moving the energy data to blockchain, we are creating credit data for mostly unbanked users. We also license the software and data to banks and micro-lending entity, which using the machine as collateral.   WHY ARE WE DIFFERENT Combination of blockchain and Internet of Things Pilot programs up and running in Guatemala The platform will be licensed to cooperative banks to enable micro-lending solutions BLS token is used to run IoT devices purchased by users to produce electricity and power Bitlumens tokens are used to access our digital platform. Bitlumens allow holders to participate in the success of the company. BLS tokens are used to send remittances. BLS tokens are used to access the data collected from IoT. The BLS supply is limited. BLS is a token supervised by KPMG   TEAM   GREENLIGHT Partners We partnered with Sun king™ products to change the lives of the world′s 2 billion off-grid consumers who use dim, dangerous kerosene lamps for light at night. MAMA - Multichain Asset Managers Association - A consortium of 20 leading financial and companies, MAMA's goal is to create a network that would efficiently solve key challenges in the asset management sector. GOGLA - The Voice of the Off-Grid Solar Energy Industry Zero & One UN Environment LoRa Alliance   ROADMAP  Concept: Whitepaper             ✓ Website                  ✓  Proof of Concept: Product Prototype   ✓ Licenses                 ✓  Prototype: Pilot Studies           ✓ Beta Users             ✓ Hardware               ✓  Live: Clients Software Prototype  Growth: Scalability Additional Features  Currently, Bitlumens follows these milestones: 1. The deployment of 100 off-grid solar devices by the end of April 2018. 2. The addition of the software to run the hardware using tokens by the end of June. 3. The deployment of IoT to track carbon and black carbon mitigation. 4. After June we will be adding solar pumps into our hardware ecosystem.    ICO SCHEDULE AND RULES  Stage                            Time              # of Tokens      Token Price     Pre ICO                 May 29 - June 18       10 Million      2 BLS /USD (+40% Bonus) ICO Day 1                     June 19                 /              1.5 BLS /USD ICO Day 2-7            June 20- June 25            /             1.4 BLS /USD ICO Day 8-14         June 26- July 2         /              1.3 BLS /USD ICO Day 15-28         July 3- July 16          /               1.2 BLS /USD  Hardcap: In the equivalent of USD 25 Million  Only payments in ETH and fiat currencies are accepted.  Bitlumens assists parties preferring to participate in the pre-ICO in fiat currency.  The final price will be determined one week before the start of the pre ICO reflecting the price movements of ETH until then.  The total supply of tokens is capped to 50,000,000, with the smallest available denomination being 0.0001.  Planning to list to several exchanges, including Binance*, after ICO. *Application in process    TOKEN DISTRIBUTION  Allocation                     Number of tokens (in million)                in % Total                                          50                                         100 Pre ICO                                      10                                          20 ICO                                            15                                          30 Bitlumens                                  17.5                                         35 Team and Advisors                       6.5                                          13 Bounty                                         1                                            2    USE OF PROCEEDINGS  Hardware                         35% Legal                               2% Wages                             35% ICO Expenses                   2% Software Development      20% Marketing and PR             6% Total                               100%    FAQ What is Bitlumens? Bitlumens brings electricity and water from renewable sources using Internet of Things (IoT) and the blockchain technology to women in rural villages in Latin America. Thanks to solar energy and our technology, people can move away from candles and kerosene lamps and use clean power electricity. They will also gain access to mobile communication and even water their crops! Women acquire our hardware with a microloan which they amortize in monthly installments. This allows them to build a credit score leading to financial inclusion and poverty alleviation. We also quantify carbon mitigation and particle matter reduction allowing each households to become carbon credit issuers.  Where is Bitlumens based? Bitlumens is incorporated in Zug, Switzerland. Most team members are also based in Switzerland. We plan to further expand to other regions proficient in blockchain technology.  How does the BLS token works? BLS tokens are needed for women farmers to run our devices which produce power for electricity or water.  How is Bitlumens decentralizing the carbon and black carbon credit market? Globally, burning kerosene for lighting generated 240 million tons of CO2 equivalent a year, around 0.5% of global emissions. In fact, just kerosene lamps replaced in Africa and Asia with solar panels saved 1.4 million tons of CO2 equivalent in 2014 alone. Bitlumens customers create valuable carbon assets that can be sold to companies and/or carbon markets.  Why undeveloped countries in Latin Americas? Most rural communities have unreliable access to power and water. These communities depend on inefficient and hazardous fuels such as biomass, kerosene, plastic, battery torches and candles. Fuels and its combustion process release greenhouse gases into the atmosphere. Bitlumens is brining clean technologies to areas where new infrastructure is needed to comply with the 2ºC target from the Paris Agreement. There are successful programs with similar ideas in Africa and Asia (such as the Aadhaar system in India).  Bitlumens incorporates blockchain technology on top of that.  Who owns the data from the device sensors? Our clients own their data. These data can be sold to the government or to development banks. The data runs in a private blockchain and is connected to our sensors. Author: loicuagio1979
Title: [ANN][PRE-ICO SALE] BITLUMENS - Solar Energy+IoT in Latin America
Body: Dear everybody, As a part of concept of Bitlumens "We distribute pay-as-you-go solar kit to undeveloped off-grid areas in Latin America, enable them access to electricity and clean water", I would like to clarify 2 main points:  1. What are off-grid/ on-grid system? - On-grid system: Produces electricity from solar panels which reaches 220V AC/ 50Hz to power the grid - Off-grid system: Storing the power from the solar panels into the AC power to readily convert to 220VAC/ 50Hz power from which provides the power loading when there's no electricity grid --> When starting the system, batteries are always given priority to charging from the sun until full. At this time, the on-grid system is not working. --> When the battery is full, the system will automatically convert DC power from the Solar Panel to 220V AC power to the grid. (Output voltage of the system is frequency, phase matching grid power can be phase 1 or phase 3) --> When power is suddenly lost, the system will automatically takes DC power from AC and Solar to transform into AC 220V power supply for priority loading. You can see the below image for better understanding     2. The advantage & disadvantages of off-grid system  - Advantages: It is very suitable for areas (rural & remote areas) where electricity grid is unstable and not available - Disadvantages:    + Maintenance costs (battery maintenance), battery life is not high, varies from 2-5 years, depending on different types of battery.    + Low conversion efficiency (mainly due to the battery system, between the discharge cycle and the loading cycle)  ...to be updated
